metadata.name: Spanner_Change_Streams_to_PubSub

parameters.name: spannerInstanceId
parameters.label: Spanner Instance ID
parameters.helpText: The Spanner instance where change streams are configured.

parameters.name: spannerDatabase
parameters.label: Spanner Database ID
parameters.helpText: The Spanner database containing the change streams.

parameters.name: spannerChangeStreamName
parameters.label: Change Stream Name
parameters.helpText: The name of the Spanner change stream to use.

parameters.name: pubsubTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Topic

parameters.name: startTimestamp
parameters.label: Start Timestamp
parameters.helpText: The timestamp to start reading changes (RFC3339 format).

parameters.name: endTimestamp
parameters.label: End Timestamp
parameters.helpText: The timestamp to stop reading changes (RFC3339 format).
